name: Telcell Top-up
description: Download the Official Top up App for Telcell Sint Martin, Sint Eustatius and Saba prepaid mobile phones  the fastest, easiest, and the most convenient way to recharge your phone!  Buy airtime from anywhere in the world!  Telcell Customers  Buy credit for your own phone in Sint Martin, Sint Eustatius and Saba or while traveling overseas. Friends or Family in the USA, Canada, France or anywhere else in the world  Add credits to your loved ones Telcell prepaid phones in Sint Martin, Sint Eustatius and Saba without paying any foreign transaction fees.  Features:  Send From Anywhere  Send Telcell airtime to your friends and family from anywhere in the world.  Top Up Your Telcell Phone  Buy credit for your own Telcell prepaid phone.  No Fees  No processing fees or bank charges.  Exclusive Promotions  Free bonus minutes and data (when applicable).  Multiple Payment Options  Pay with Visa, Mastercard, Amex or PayPal.  Easy Registration  Quickly sign up with email, Facebook, or Google logins.  Auto-Top Up  Set up a recurring top up for hassle-free recurring transactions.  Single Login  Use your same account on the Telcell website and the Top-Up App.  Quickly Repeat Your Last Top Up - Single touch Repeat Top Up option lets you send to the same phone number with the same amount instantly.  Its as easy as 1,2,3: 1. Enter the phone number 2. Select an amount 3. Hit pay and send!
